Title: Includes certain use of Bluetooth technology to follow a person in the crime of stalking in the fourth degree
Summary: Includes the use of Bluetooth technology in the definition of "following" a person, as it relates to the crime of stalking in the fourth degree.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to including certain use of Bluetooth technology to follow a person in the crime of stalking in the fourth degree
